description:
Shey is a 23-year-old boy from Texas with a cute accent and warm smile. I sat down with him before his shoot in order to get to know him a little better.
"Shey is an unusual name," I commented.
"Yeah, my grandfather was Irish," he replied.
"Cool, you got a girlfriend?"
He does. As it turns out, she just got new boobs and was showing them off at two of the local strip joints.
"Does that make you jealous? That she's dancing naked in front of all those other guys?"
"Well, she's not completely naked," he replied. "But no, it doesn't bother me."
Changing the subject, I asked, "So, how do you think this is going to go?"
"Pretty good I think," he replied.
"Are you a shooter?"
"It depends," he said, grinning. "Sometimes."
Turns out he is! The first shot flew a good 4 to 5 feet across the bed.
"I haven't nutted like that in a while," he remarked afterward. "I've been saving it up."
His second ejaculation was just as impressive though — clear up and over his shoulder.
Shey would like to make porn into a career.
"I got an all right size dick, y'know," he explained.
title: Shey
